models.name: todo_list_system_settings
models.description: Stores system-wide configuration settings that control application behavior and features. These settings are managed by system administrators and affect the entire application's operation.

foreignFields.name: created_by_id
foreignFields.description: User who created this system setting. {@link todo_list_basicuser.id}.

foreignFields.name: updated_by_id
foreignFields.description: User who last updated this system setting. {@link todo_list_basicuser.id}.

plainFields.name: key
plainFields.description: Unique identifier for the system setting (e.g., 'maintenance_mode', 'rate_limit'

plainFields.name: value
plainFields.description: Value of the system setting (e.g., 'true', '1000', '2023-01-01')

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description of what the system setting controls and its purpose

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the setting (active, inactive, deprecated)

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this setting was created

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this setting was last updated

models.name: todo_list_audit_logs
models.description: Records all significant security and administrative events within the system for compliance and monitoring purposes. These logs capture who did what and when for audit trail requirements.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: User responsible for the audited action. {@link todo_list_basicuser.id}.

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Type of action performed (e.g., 'login', 'password_reset', 'settings_update')

plainFields.name: entity_type
plainFields.description: Type of entity affected by the action (e.g., 'user', 'task', 'setting')

plainFields.name: entity_id
plainFields.description: ID of the entity affected by the action

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Additional details about the action in JSON format

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which the action was performed

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Browser/Client user agent string

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this audit log was created

models.name: todo_list_error_logs
models.description: Captures system errors and exceptions for monitoring, debugging, and reliability improvement. These logs help identify issues and patterns in system failures.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: User associated with the error context. {@link todo_list_basicuser.id}.

plainFields.name: level
plainFields.description: Severity level of the error (error, warning, critical)

plainFields.name: message
plainFields.description: Error message or exception message

plainFields.name: stack_trace
plainFields.description: Full stack trace of the error in text format

plainFields.name: context
plainFields.description: Additional context about the error in JSON format

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which the error originated

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: Browser/Client user agent string

plainFields.name: endpoint
plainFields.description: API endpoint or route where the error occurred

plainFields.name: method
plainFields.description: HTTP method of the failed request

plainFields.name: status_code
plainFields.description: HTTP status code returned with the error

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this error log was created

models.name: todo_list_basicuser
models.description: Core user entity for the todo list application that represents registered users who can manage their tasks. This table stores essential user information including authentication credentials and profile data.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Unique email address used for authentication and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: BCrypt hashed password for secure authentication.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the user account (active, suspended, banned).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

models.name: todo_list_basicuser_sessions
models.description: User session management table that stores active authentication sessions for users. This supports the JWT-based authentication system by maintaining refresh tokens and session state.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_basicuser_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the authenticated user. {@link todo_list_basicuser.id}.

plainFields.name: session_id
plainFields.description: Unique identifier for the user session.

plainFields.name: refresh_token
plainFields.description: Long-lived refresh token for maintaining user sessions.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: User agent string identifying the client device/browser.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address from which the session was created.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Expiration timestamp for the session.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the session was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the session was last updated.

models.name: todo_list_password_reset_tokens
models.description: Temporary tokens used for password reset functionality that enable users to recover access to their accounts when they forget their passwords.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_basicuser_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the user requesting password reset. {@link todo_list_basicuser.id}.

plainFields.name: token
plainFields.description: Cryptographically secure token for password reset verification.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Expiration timestamp after which the token becomes invalid.

plainFields.name: used_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the token was used for password reset.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reset token was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the reset token was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for token revocation.

models.name: todo_list_tasks
models.description: Stores individual tasks created by users in the todo list application. Each task contains the description and completion status information.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_basicuser_id
foreignFields.description: The user who created the task. {@link todo_list_basicuser.id}.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: The task description text entered by the user.

plainFields.name: completed
plainFields.description: Indicates whether the task has been completed.

plainFields.name: completed_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the task was marked as completed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the task was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when the task was last updated.
